org.fluidity.foundation

Class Methods

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fluidity.foundation.Utility
      • org.fluidity.foundation.Methods

  • public final class Methods
extends Utility
    Convenience methods on methods.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Methods.Selector<T>
      Allows the caller of Methods.get() to find a method without referring to it by name.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

      Finds method objects in a refactoring friendly way.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static <T> Method[] get(Class<T> type,
                               Methods.Selector<T> selector)
        Finds method objects in a refactoring friendly way.

        Note: only works on interface methods.

        Usage

        Let's say you need to find the Closeable.close() method at run time: 
         final Method closeMethod = Methods.get(Closeable.class, new Methods.Invoker<Closeable>() {
   public void invoke(final Closeable capture) {
     capture.close();
   }
 })[0];
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the interface to capture method calls on.
        Parameters:
        type - the interface that directly or indirectly defines the method you seek.
        selector - code that invokes the method on the supplied implementation of the specified interface type.
        Returns:
        the method object.

      • invoke

        public static Object invoke(Method method,
                            Object target,
                            Object... arguments)
                     throws Exceptions.Wrapper
        Invokes the given method on the given target with the given arguments. All checked exceptions thrown from the method will be wrapped in Exceptions.Wrapper.
        Parameters:
        method - the method to invoke; may not be null.
        target - the object to invoke the method on; may be null if the method is static.
        arguments - the arguments to pass to the method.
        Returns:
        whatever the method returns.
        Throws:
        Exceptions.Wrapper - wraps all checked exceptions thrown by the method.
